text: Guft Ja'quʙ (alajhissalom): «Hargiz uro ʙo sumo namefiristam, to ʙo man ʙa nomi Alloh pajmone ʙiʙanded va ʙa nomi U qasam xured, ki uro ʙa nazdi man ʙozmegardoned. Magar on ki cize ʙar sari sumo ojad va hama giriftor saved va tavonoii az on xalos sudanro nadosta ʙosed». Pas, cun ahdi xesro dodand, guft (Ja'quʙ): «Alloh ʙar on ci meguem, guvoh ast!»
